comment: GREAT CLASS! He may not make a lot of sense the first time he explains something, but its a REALLYYY easy class to get an A in. He grades tests starting over 100 points so even if you get some wrong you can still get a 100. He also drops your lowest test score. He's nice too. Really really easy to get a good grade!

He is a great teacher. He is so funny. I absolutely loved his class. I found it frustrating at first, but then once I understood his sense of humor, it made it tons easier. He lets you make a cheat sheet for every test, and retake a test, AND drop the lowest one. AWESOME CLASS

I would NEVER TAKE THIS CLASS. ALL HE TALKS ABOUT IS SPACE AND PHYSICS. He does not teach the material at all. He also   calls a student to board each to write all the problems on the board and do the work to them. His grading policy i loved though, which is how I passed.
He definitely teaches you some cool new ways to do math which makes it easier to understand. But, I wouldn't recommend him. Just not the most lively professor. Only okay.

TAKE THIS CLASS!!! Easiest Math class I have ever taken in my life. He's kinda funny and extremely easy. He lets your drop your lowest test grade. You can retake any test you want to get a better grade. And if that's not enough you DO NOT have homework, he GIVES you the test ahead of time AND he let's you use a cheat sheet on every test! TAKE THIS!

This class is EASY!!!! you're crazy if you don't take his class. He gives you the test ahead of time and you can use a cheat sheet on the test. You just have to to get to class. I did not study for a single test. I just went to class and used the sheet. Would highly recommend! Easy A

Though the class is not mandatory, DO NOT skip class if you don't want to miss out on good information. Dr. Matson is AWESOME. I would totally recommend him to anyone. He really cares about your grade and will do anything to make sure that you are happy. He is funny and a total sweetheart. Take this class.

he's a good teacher and gives a lot of extra points. he's very knowledgeable though sometimes I dont agree with his teaching methods. Sometimes I feel it would have been easier to come in, get the notes or review test and learn it on my own because though you remember the material, he re-teaches it very differently. Recommended if you want an A.

He is the rudest teacher I have ever had.  He makes fun of the students and is so disorganized with his teaching.  I ended up withdrawing from the class because I would have lost my scholarship if I had stayed in it.  If you take MATH1101, find another professor

Really helpful and knows so much about space/math. Is a incredible teacher, just have to pay attention. Does his best with make-up tests, etc. being really friendly. Would take him again, just be polite.

He is HORRIBLE!!! He is rude, looks at students as if they were dumb if they ask a question. You must go to math lab if you take him but overall you can get an easy A if you learn how to do the problems from the math lab because your final is your grade if you do better on it than your average of test. He drops the lowest test.

Sarcastic, mean, old man. Obviously bitter about having to teach such a low lvl class & can at times make bright students feel dumb. Gives 5 exams, allows 1 to be retaken & drops lowest test grade. Final is cumulative. You will have to depend on text and teach yourself for all tests + be present to get the few notes he has some1 write on the board.

This is the WORST teacher I have ever had.  I have attended his classes and have learned nothing from him. Its a waste of time, I would rather be in the math lab. He does not use a lesson plan, he does not write on the board, he does not teach math.  HE JUST SITS THERE!  I do not recommend him.

This teacher is adamant that you learn his style, his terms and his way of teaching.  Unfortunately, he never makes it clear to you what he is teaching.  This class is utterly useless to me, as it has thus far taught me nothing.  Apparently everyone who attends his class regularly gets a B or better, but I have been here everyday.  Not sure how.
Tests comes straight from the book, so you already have the answers. Its an easy A, but you will learn nothing from his teaching.

HORRIBLE! although he is very knowledgeable on the subject he fails to teach in a way anyone can understand. you have a test every other week with little review because he generally just reviews over very specific concepts. Overall i would not take him because he cannot teach effectively and he is always talking down to the class for no reason

Easy easy easy class.  Awesome guy, really really funny.  He is very sarcastic and makes fun of the students a lot, it's great.  Class is pointless but it is very easy. Just pay attention and read your book.  He doesnt make things extremely clear but he does know what hes talking about and if you listen to him and read the book you should get an A

I liked him as a person but not as a teacher.  The class was a giant waste of time.  It's good for an easy A, but otherwise a complete waste.  The way he teaches is really confusing and disorganized.   I didn't enjoy the class, and most of my classmates didn't seem to either.

Dr. Matson is awesome he has experienced everything in the world and is the most successful person i know. He used to be a cosmonaut for the Russians and he knows everything there is to know about math, he makes it easy and always has a good story to tell. I highly suggest professor Matson, he cuts the **** and shows you how to do math.
